mapper.sql: a.id, a.rd_day, a.rd_num, b.goods_code, b.goods_name, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(e.in_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),'入库',DATE_FORMAT(e.expiring_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),'到期',e.cost_price,'元成本价') goodsStorageInName, a.remark
mapper.select: SELECT FROM goods_storage_rd a INNER JOIN goods_sku b ON a.goods_sku_id = b.id INNER JOIN goods_storage_in c ON c.id=a.goods_storage_in_id WHERE a.id=#{id}

SELECT a.id,CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(a.in_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),'入库',DATE_FORMAT(a.expiring_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),'到期',a.cost_price,'元成本价') goodsStorageInName FROM goods_storage_in a INNER JOIN goods_sku b ON a.goods_sku_id = b.id WHERE a.goods_sku_id=#{_parameter} AND a.curr_count>0 ORDER BY a.in_date DESC
SELECT a.market_price FROM goods_storage_in a INNER JOIN goods_sku b ON b.id=a.goods_sku_id WHERE b.goods_code= #{_parameter} GROUP BY a.market_price LIMIT 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_storage_rd ( id, rd_day, rd_num, goods_sku_id, goods_storage_in_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rdDay}, #{rdNum}, #{goodsSkuId}, #{goodsStorageInId}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy}, now() )
